english.segment1: Hear our cry, Lord, we pray. Our faces down, our hands are raised. You called us out, we turned away. We've turned away
english.segment2: With shipwrecked faith the idols rise. We do what is right in our own eyes. Our children now will pay the price. We need Your light, Lord, shine Your light

english.segment4: All our hearts, all our strength. With all our minds, we're at Your feet. May Your kingdom come in our hearts and lives. Let Your church arise, let Your church arise
